City Administrator’s Office
===========================



### City Administrator

Pablo Rodriguez
---------------

“The City Administrator’s office is committed to effective governance, fiscal responsibility, and ensuring quality services that enhance the well-being of our community."

[Reach Out ->](https://presidiotx.us/?page_id=17)

![IMG_1147](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/IMG_1147-r5ipvo16xglhbw7p141gvjkol21upoeo4dhc36g3k0.jpg "IMG_1147")

[### Email](https://presidiotx.us/?page_id=50#)

prodriguez@presidotx.us

[### Contact Me](https://presidiotx.us/?page_id=50#)

432-229-3517

[### Location](https://presidiotx.us/?page_id=50#)

507 E. O’Reilly St.  
      P.O. Box 1899  
      Presidio, TX 79845
